intrude.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to interrupt someone or become involved in their private affairs, in an annoying and unwanted way
intrude.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Would I be intruding if I came with you?
Employers should not intrude into the private lives of their employees.
intrude.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to come into a place or situation, and have an unwanted effect
intrude.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: It is to be hoped that TV cameras never intrude on this peaceful place.
